attributes.action: Allow Ukrainian refugees into this country without a visa
attributes.additional_details: It's our humanitarian duty to help the people of the Ukraine and allow them safe entry into our country.
attributes.background: I believe that it is our duty to help the victims of war. How can the government say it stand by the Ukraine and not offer safety to its displaced people

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
